CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name == $Label.Voucher_IR_RT_Emission_Name || RecordType.Name == $Label.Voucher_IR_RT_OnCreation_Name ,'France' ,IF($Profile.Name == 'French Service Agent' || $Profile.Name == 'French Service Manager', 'France' , IF($Profile.Name == 'Italy Service Agent' || $Profile.Name == 'Italy Service Manager','Italy',IF($Profile.Name == 'Spain Service Agent' || $Profile.Name == 'Spain Service Manager','Spain',''))))
CustomField.label: Zone de validit√©
